Equipment Actions.Action 1: Bite, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 1 Piercing

Other Actions.Action 1: Euphoria Breath, The Faerie Dragon exhales a puff of gas at a creature.  The affected creature becomes confused and behaves erratically

Abilities.Ability 1: Superior Invisibility, The Faerie Dragon can magically turn invisible as a Bonus Action
Abilities.Ability 2: Limited Telepathy, The Faerie Dragon can magically communicate with any other Faerie Dragon within range
Abilities.Ability 3: Magic Resistance, The Faerie Dragon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects
Abilities.Ability 4: Innate Spellcasting, The Faerie Dragon can innately cast a number of spells depending on its age and colour
